desc:
This is the father of 2048.
Try this beautiful and addicted game, challenge your mind and imagination. From the kid to the king, grow your little characters, and try to make the final "1024"!

風靡全球的創意合成遊戲1024!
"一旦玩兒上，根本停不下來啊！" - 玩家評價
"再玩剁手!!" - 玩家評價

name: Slip Quest
怪兽传送门
desc:
Sticky, cutie… ON THEIR WAY HOME！
Monsters in forest are lost, please help them!
Just slip your finger, and all the monsters will follow.
Sometimes a pause will get you faster, so use the trees and stones to stop them.

*** How to Play ***
Just slip your finger, and all the monsters will follow.
Sometimes a pause will get you faster, so use the trees and stones to stop them.

*** Features ***
● 24 levels with 72 challenges.
● Innovative group control game-play mechanics
● Cutie monsters and beautiful game world 
● Fun and educational, mind-bending experience suitable for all ages 
● Great for kids and the young at heart – it’s all your children will be talking about!

快点来帮助小怪物找到他们的家吧。

*** 怎么玩 ***
滑动小手指，所有的小怪物们都会跟着你的指挥跑哦
有时候停一停更好，好好地利用小树和大石头吧。

*** 游戏特点 ***
● 24 个关卡一共包含 72 个挑战。
● 创新的群组指挥游戏模式。
● 有可爱的小怪物们和美丽的游戏地图。
● 好玩，富有教育意义的游戏，可以更好地锻炼你的思维模式。
● 特别适合儿童或者富有童心的人。

name: Monster Grow
合体小怪兽
desc:
Monsters in forest are lost, please help them!
*** How to Play ***
Just slip your finger, and all the monsters will follow.
Sometimes a pause will get you faster, so use the trees and stones to stop them.

快點來幫助小怪物找到他們的家吧。
*** 怎麼玩 ***
滑動小手指，所有的小怪物們都會跟著你的指揮跑哦
有時候停一停更好，好好地利用小樹和大石頭吧。

name: Just Clear All
Just Clear All
desc:
100% original puzzle game!
If you like PopStar or 2048, you shouldn't miss this!

100%原创系列！
如果你喜欢消灭星星，2048这样的小游戏，你不应该错过！
